desc: Send a message to a channel

channel.desc: Channel to send message to. Can be a public channel, private group or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.

text.desc: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

parse.desc: Change how messages are treated. See below.

link_names.desc: Find and link channel names and usernames.

unfurl_links.desc: Pass 1 to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.
